name: Skyline Superior Room | 1 King
description: Standard king room in the Skyline Tower featuring one king-size bed, comfortable furnishings, High Definition TV, in-room safe, high-speed Wi-Fi, refreshment center, mini-refrigerator, and complimentary coffee. A solid choice for couples or business travelers.
shortDescription: Standard king room in the Skyline Tower with modern amenities and comfort.

meta.title: Skyline Superior Room 1 King – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Skyline Superior King Room at Eldorado Resort Reno – comfortable king accommodations in the Skyline Tower.

testimonials.quote: Visited Skyline Superior Room | 1 King during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Steve N.

testimonials.quote: Skyline Superior Room | 1 King was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Sean W.
